name: 泼墨 ink splash
description:
泼墨 ink splash

泼墨是中国画的一种画法，将墨挥洒在纸或绢上。墨如泼出，画面气势奔放。

"Pomo" is a Chinese word that refers to a painting technique in traditional Chinese painting, in which ink is splashed or splattered onto paper or silk. The ink creates a dynamic and expressive effect, capturing the essence of the subject in a bold and powerful way.

使用时请尽量使用较低的CFG以达到黑白画面的效果

Please use a lower CFG to achieve a black and white image effect
